question: The "Seven Brothers Islands" is located in which country?
explanation: The Seven Brothers Islands is located in and under the administration of Djibouti. It is an archipelago located in the Bab-el-Mandeb strait connecting both the Red Sea and the Gulf of Aden. It is a notable diving site. It is a group of six volcanic islands and one volcanic hill located at the northern tip of Ras Siyyan Peninsula.
